California Institution for Men.label: California Institution for Men
California Institution for Men.description: California Institution for Men is a male-only state prison located in the city of Chino, San Bernardino County, California. It is often colloquially referenced as "Chino." Wikipedia

California Institution for Women.label: California Institution for Women
California Institution for Women.description: California Institution for Women is a female-only state prison located in the city of Chino, San Bernardino County, California. Wikipedia

Columbia Correctional Institution.label: Columbia Correctional Institution
Columbia Correctional Institution.description: The Columbia Correctional Institution is an adult male maximum-security correctional facility operated by the Wisconsin Department of Corrections Division of Adult Institutions in Portage, Wisconsin. The operating capacity is 541. Wikipedia
Hours: Wisconsin Dept Of Corrections School District

Lansing Correctional Facility.label: Lansing Correctional Facility
Lansing Correctional Facility.description: Lansing Correctional Facility is a state prison operated by the Kansas Department of Corrections. LCF is located in Lansing, Kansas, in Leavenworth County. Wikipedia

Washington State Penitentiary.label: Washington State Penitentiary
Washington State Penitentiary.description: Washington State Penitentiary is a Washington State Department of Corrections men's prison located in Walla Walla, Washington. With an operating capacity of 2200, it is the second largest prison in the state and is surrounded by wheat fields. Wikipedia

Coxsackie Correctional Facility.label: Coxsackie Correctional Facility
Coxsackie Correctional Facility.description: Coxsackie Correctional Facility is a maximum security prison in New York in the USA. The prison is in the Town of Coxsackie in Greene County, New York. Wikipedia

Lowell Correctional Institution.label: Lowell Correctional Institution
Lowell Correctional Institution.description: Lowell Correctional Institution located in unincorporated Marion County, Florida, near Ocala, was the first Florida prison for women. It was opened in April 1956 as the Florida Correctional Institution. Wikipedia

Vestre Fængsel.label: Vestre Fængsel
Vestre Fængsel.description: Vestre Fængsel is the main jail of the Danish capital, Copenhagen. Erected in 1895, it is Denmark's largest prison with a total capacity of 530 inmates. It primarily houses pretrial detainees, not convicted felons. Wikipedia

Black Beach.label: Black's Beach
Black Beach.description: Black's Beach is a secluded section of beach beneath the bluffs of Torrey Pines on the Pacific Ocean in La Jolla, San Diego, California, United States. It is officially part of Torrey Pines State Beach. Wikipedia

Landsberg Prison.label: Landsberg Prison
Landsberg Prison.description: Landsberg Prison is a penal facility located in the town of Landsberg am Lech in the southwest of the German state of Bavaria, about 65 kilometres west of Munich and 35 kilometres south of Augsburg. Wikipedia

Oklahoma State Reformatory.label: Oklahoma State Reformatory
Oklahoma State Reformatory.description: The Oklahoma State Reformatory is a medium-security facility with some maximum and minimum-security housing for adult male inmates. Located off of U.S. Highway 9 in Granite, Oklahoma, the 10-acre facility has a maximum capacity of 1042 inmates. Wikipedia

Bandyup Women's Prison.label: Bandyup Women's Prison
Bandyup Women's Prison.description: Bandyup Women's Prison is located in the northeastern rural Perth suburb of West Swan, Western Australia. Prior to its construction, the female prisoners were at Fremantle Prison, which was overcrowded and offered women limited opportunities. Wikipedia

Minnesota Correctional Facility – Oak Pa.label: Minnesota Correctional Facility – Oak Park Heights
Minnesota Correctional Facility – Oak Pa.description: Minnesota Correctional Facility – Oak Park Heights is Minnesota’s only Level Five maximum security prison. The facility is located near the cities of Bayport and Stillwater. Wikipedia

Ely State Prison.label: Ely State Prison
Ely State Prison.description: Ely State Prison is a maximum security penitentiary located in unincorporated White Pine County, Nevada, north of Ely. The facility, operated by the Nevada Department of Corrections, opened in July 1989. Wikipedia

Dodge Correctional Institution.label: Dodge Correctional Institution
Dodge Correctional Institution.description: Dodge Correctional Institution, is an adult male maximum-security correctional facility operated by the Wisconsin Department of Corrections Division of Adult Institutions in Waupun, Wisconsin. Wikipedia

Cooma Correctional Centre.label: Cooma Correctional Centre
Cooma Correctional Centre.description: Cooma Correctional Centre, an Australian minimum to medium prison for males and females, is located in Cooma, New South Wales. Wikipedia

Sugar House Prison (Utah).label: Sugar House Prison
Sugar House Prison (Utah).description: Sugar House Prison, previously the Utah Territorial Penitentiary, was a prison in the Sugar House neighborhood of Salt Lake City, Utah, United States. The 180-acre prison housed more than 400 inmates. Wikipedia

Naini Central Prison.label: Naini Central Prison
Naini Central Prison.description: Naini Central Prison or Naini Jail at Naini, near Allahabad, is one of most important prison, and Correctional Institution in Uttar Pradesh, built during the British Raj. Wikipedia

Parramatta Correctional Centre.label: Parramatta Correctional Centre
Parramatta Correctional Centre.description: Parramatta Correctional Centre, a former Australian medium security prison for males, was in operation between 1798 and 2011. Wikipedia

Oberon Correctional Centre.label: Oberon Correctional Centre
Oberon Correctional Centre.description: Oberon Correctional Centre, an Australian minimum security prison for young male offenders, is located 40 kilometres from Oberon, New South Wales. Wikipedia

Chuckawalla Valley State Prison.label: Chuckawalla Valley State Prison
Chuckawalla Valley State Prison.description: Chuckawalla Valley State Prison is located south of Interstate 10, in a detached section of Blythe, California, that lies west of the main portion of the city. It is located in eastern Riverside County, California, adjacent to Ironwood State Prison. Wikipedia

Southern Queensland Correctional Centre.label: Southern Queensland Correctional Centre
Southern Queensland Correctional Centre.description: The Southern Queensland Correctional Centre is an Australian prison facility located in the Lockyer Valley, 15 km north from Gatton, and 94 km west from Brisbane, Queensland. Wikipedia

Joliet Correctional Center.label: Joliet Correctional Center
Joliet Correctional Center.description: Joliet Correctional Center was a prison in Joliet, Illinois, United States from 1858 to 2002. It is featured in the motion picture The Blues Brothers as the prison from which Jake Blues is released at the beginning of the movie. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Institution, Lompoc.label: Federal Correctional Institution, Lompoc
Federal Correctional Institution, Lompoc.description: The Federal Correctional Institution, Lompoc is a low-security United States federal prison for male inmates in California. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Institution, Sherid.label: Federal Correctional Institution, Sheridan
Federal Correctional Institution, Sherid.description: The Federal Correctional Institution, Sheridan is a medium-security United States federal prison for male inmates in Oregon. Opened in 1989, it is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

Kern Valley State Prison.label: Kern Valley State Prison
Kern Valley State Prison.description: Kern Valley State Prison is a male-only state prison in Delano, California. Kern Valley is a Level IV Maximum Security institution. This prison houses 4,171 inmates with a design capacity of 2,448 or 170.4 percent. Wikipedia

Puzhal Central Prison.label: Puzhal Central Prison
Puzhal Central Prison.description: Puzhal Central Prison is located in Tiruvallur District near Chennai, India. It is about 23 km from the city centre. The prison began operational from year 2006 replacing the erstwhile Chennai Central Prison. Wikipedia

Tennessee State Prison.label: Tennessee State Prison
Tennessee State Prison.description: Tennessee State Prison is a former correctional facility located near downtown Nashville, Tennessee. Opened in 1898, the prison has been closed since 1992. Wikipedia

Coyote Ridge Corrections Center.label: Coyote Ridge Corrections Center
Coyote Ridge Corrections Center.description: Coyote Ridge Corrections Center is a medium security prison located in Connell, Washington. Inmates held here typically have more than five years up to life to serve. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Institution, Fort W.label: Federal Correctional Institution, Fort Worth
Federal Correctional Institution, Fort W.description: The Federal Correctional Institution is a low-security United States federal prison for male inmates located in the city of Fort Worth, Texas. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

Massachusetts Correctional Institution –.label: Massachusetts Correctional Institution – Shirley
Massachusetts Correctional Institution –.description: Massachusetts Correctional Institution – Shirley is a medium-security state prison in Shirley, Massachusetts. The facility also contains a minimum security section which houses less dangerous prisoners. Wikipedia

United States Penitentiary, Canaan.label: United States Penitentiary, Canaan
United States Penitentiary, Canaan.description: The United States Penitentiary, Canaan is a high-security United States federal prison for male inmates, with a satellite prison camp for minimum-security male inmates. Wikipedia

California State Prison, Los Angeles Cou.label: California State Prison, Los Angeles County
California State Prison, Los Angeles Cou.description: California State Prison, Los Angeles County is a male-only state prison located in the city of Lancaster, in Los Angeles County, California. Wikipedia

Beechworth Correctional Centre.label: Beechworth Correctional Centre
Beechworth Correctional Centre.description: The Beechworth Correctional Centre is a minimum security prison, located in Beechworth, Victoria, Australia. It was opened in January 2005 as a replacement for the now-closed HM Prison Beechworth. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Complex, Beaumont.label: United States Penitentiary, Beaumont
Federal Correctional Complex, Beaumont.description: The United States Penitentiary, Beaumont is a high-security United States federal prison for male inmates in Texas. Wikipedia

Chillicothe Correctional Institution.label: Chillicothe Correctional Institution
Chillicothe Correctional Institution.description: Chillicothe Correction Institution, or CCI, is a state run medium security prison on the west bank of the Scioto River just outside Chillicothe, Ohio. Wikipedia

Emu Plains Correctional Centre.label: Emu Plains Correctional Centre
Emu Plains Correctional Centre.description: Emu Plains Correctional Centre, an Australian minimum security prison for females, is located on Old Bathurst Rd, Emu Plains, New South Wales. Wikipedia

Junction City Prison.label: Junction City Prison
Junction City Prison.description: Junction City Prison was located at the intersection of S Adcock Road and Pen Road NW near Junction City, Ohio. Wikipedia

Wildman River Wilderness Work Camp.label: Wildman River Wilderness Work Camp
Wildman River Wilderness Work Camp.description: Wildman River Wilderness Work Camp, an Australian minimum security prison for juvenile males, is located in the Mary River National Park at Wildman River, approximately 170 kilometres from Darwin, Northern Territory, Australia. Wikipedia

Avenal State Prison.label: Avenal State Prison
Avenal State Prison.description: Avenal State Prison is a male-only state prison in the city of Avenal, Kings County, California. Wikipedia

Portlaoise Prison.label: Portlaoise Prison
Portlaoise Prison.description: Portlaoise Prison is Ireland's only high security prison. It is located in Portlaoise, County Laois. It should not be confused with the Midlands Prison, which is a newer, medium security prison situated directly beside it. Wikipedia

United States Penitentiary, Big Sandy.label: United States Penitentiary, Big Sandy
United States Penitentiary, Big Sandy.description: The United States Penitentiary, Big Sandy is a high-security United States federal prison for male inmates in Kentucky, near Inez. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

Melbourne Youth Justice Centre.label: Melbourne Youth Justice Centre
Melbourne Youth Justice Centre.description: Melbourne Youth Justice Centre, is a youth corrections facility located in Parkville, Victoria, Australia. Wikipedia

Arbour Hill Prison.label: Arbour Hill Prison
Arbour Hill Prison.description: Arbour Hill Prison is a prison and military cemetery located in the Arbour Hill area near Heuston Station in the centre of Dublin, Ireland. The prison is the national centre for male sex offenders. Wikipedia

Massachusetts Correctional Institution –.label: Massachusetts Correctional Institution – Plymouth
Massachusetts Correctional Institution –.description: Massachusetts Correctional Institution – Plymouth or MCI - Plymouth is a minimum-security prison facility located in the Myles Standish State Forest in Plymouth, Massachusetts. Wikipedia

Salinas Valley State Prison.label: Salinas Valley State Prison
Salinas Valley State Prison.description: Salinas Valley State Prison is a 300-acre Californian state prison located 5 miles north of Soledad, in Monterey County, California. Wikipedia

Richard J. Donovan Correctional Facility.label: Richard J. Donovan Correctional Facility
Richard J. Donovan Correctional Facility.description: Richard J. Donovan Correctional Facility is a state prison located in unincorporated southern San Diego County, California, near San Diego. It is a part of the California Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation. It is a 780-acre facility. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Institution, Ray Br.label: Federal Correctional Institution, Ray Brook
Federal Correctional Institution, Ray Br.description: The Federal Correctional Institution, Ray Brook is a medium-security United States federal prison for male inmates in New York State. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

People detained by the International Cri.label: People detained by the International Criminal Court
People detained by the International Cri.description: People detained by the International Criminal Court are held in the ICC's detention centre, which is located within a Dutch prison in Scheveningen, The Hague. Wikipedia

Wasco State Prison.label: Wasco State Prison
Wasco State Prison.description: Wasco State Prison-Reception Center is a 634-acre state prison located in Wasco, Kern County, California. Wikipedia

United States Penitentiary, Atwater.label: United States Penitentiary, Atwater
United States Penitentiary, Atwater.description: The United States Penitentiary, Atwater is a high-security United States federal prison for male inmates in California. The institution also includes a minimum-security satellite camp. Wikipedia

Pul-e-Charkhi prison.label: Pul-e-Charkhi prison
Pul-e-Charkhi prison.description: Pul-e-Charkhi, also known as Afghan National Detention Facility, is the largest prison in Afghanistan east of Kabul. Construction of the jail began in the 1970s by order of former president Mohammed Daoud Khan and was completed during the 1980s. Wikipedia

Federal Correctional Institution, Termin.label: Federal Correctional Institution, Terminal Island
Federal Correctional Institution, Termin.description: The Federal Correctional Institution, Terminal Island is a low-security United States federal prison for male inmates in California. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

Waupun Correctional Institution.label: Waupun Correctional Institution
Waupun Correctional Institution.description: The Waupun Correctional Institution is a maximum security penitentiary in Waupun, Wisconsin. The prison is under the command of Warden William Pollard. Wikipedia
Phone: Wisconsin Dept Of Corrections School District

California Men's Colony.label: California Men's Colony
California Men's Colony.description: California Men's Colony is a male-only state prison located northwest of the city of San Luis Obispo, San Luis Obispo County, California, along the central California coast approximately halfway between Los Angeles and San Francisco. Wikipedia

HM Prison Maze.label: HM Prison Maze
HM Prison Maze.description:
Her Majesty's Prison Maze was a prison in Northern Ireland that was used to house paramilitary prisoners during the Troubles from mid-1971 to mid-2000.
It was situated at the former Royal Air Force station of Long Kesh, on the outskirts of Lisburn. Wikipedia

California State Prison, Sacramento.label: California State Prison, SacramentoCalifornia Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation
California State Prison, Sacramento.description: California State Prison, Sacramento is a male-only state prison located in the city of Folsom, in Sacramento County, California. Wikipedia

Isle of Man Prison.label: Isle of Man Prison
Isle of Man Prison.description: Isle of Man Prison is a mixed-use prison located in the Jurby parish of the Isle of Man. The prison is operated by the Isle of Man Prison Service and is the only functioning prison on the island. Wikipedia

Long Bay Correctional Centre.label: Long Bay Correctional Centre
Long Bay Correctional Centre.description: Long Bay Correctional Complex, an Australian maximum and minimum security prison for males and females, is located at Malabar, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia. The complex is located approximately 14 kilometres south of the Sydney CBD. Wikipedia

United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth.label: United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth
United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth.description: The United States Penitentiary, Leavenworth is a medium-security United States federal prison for male inmates in Kansas. It is operated by the Federal Bureau of Prisons, a division of the United States Department of Justice. Wikipedia

Bordeaux Prison.label: Bordeaux Prison
Bordeaux Prison.description: The Bordeaux Prison, is a provincial prison in Montreal, Quebec, Canada It is located at 800 Gouin Boulevard West in the borough of Ahuntsic-Cartierville. Wikipedia

District Jail Rawalpindi.label: District Jail Rawalpindi
District Jail Rawalpindi.description: District Jail Rawalpindi had been a prominent jail in Rawalpindi, Pakistan located near District Courts of Rawalpindi city. The Jail was inherited by the Punjab Prisons Department besides 18 other Jails after independence. Wikipedia

Morton Hall Immigration Removal Centre.label: Morton Hall Immigration Removal Centre
Morton Hall Immigration Removal Centre.description: IRC Morton Hall is an Immigration Removal Centre located in the village of Morton Hall in Lincolnshire, England. The centre is operated by Her Majesty's Prison Service, and was previously a women's prison. Wikipedia

Kirkconnell Correctional Centre.label: Kirkconnell Correctional Centre
Kirkconnell Correctional Centre.description: Kirkconnell Correctional Centre, an Australian former minimum security prison for males, is located 30 kilometres east of Bathurst, New South Wales. Wikipedia

Special Handling Unit.label: Special Handling Unit
Special Handling Unit.description: The Special Handling Unit is Canada's highest security prison. It is co-located with the Ste-Anne-des-Plaines Institution and the Regional Reception Centre, at the Correctional Service of Canada complex at Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec. Wikipedia

Federal Detention Center, Houston.label: Federal Detention Center, Houston
Federal Detention Center, Houston.description: The Federal Detention Center, Houston is a United States federal prison in downtown Houston, Texas which holds male and female inmates prior to and during court proceedings, as well an inmates serving short sentences. Wikipedia

Mittelbau-Dora.label: Mittelbau-Dora
Mittelbau-Dora.description: Mittelbau-Dora was a subcamp of Buchenwald concentration camp in Nazi Germany. Its prisoners were used by the SS mainly in the tunnel excavation and nearby underground stations of the Mittelwerk Ltd., ... Wikipedia

Clemens Unit.label: Clemens Unit
Clemens Unit.description: Clemens Unit is a prison farm of the Texas Department of Criminal Justice in unincorporated Brazoria County, Texas in Greater Houston. Wikipedia

Boggo Road Gaol.label: Boggo Road Gaol
Boggo Road Gaol.description: Boggo Road Gaol was a notorious and heritage-listed Australian prison located on Annerley Road in Dutton Park, an inner southern suburb of Brisbane, Queensland, Australia. Wikipedia

Clerkenwell Prison.label: Clerkenwell Prison
Clerkenwell Prison.description: Clerkenwell Prison, also known as the Clerkenwell House of Detention or Middlesex House of Detention was a prison in Clerkenwell, London. It held prisoners awaiting trial. Wikipedia

Adelaide Gaol.label: Adelaide Gaol
Adelaide Gaol.description: Adelaide Gaol was an Australian prison located in Thebarton, South Australia, Australia. The gaol was the first permanent one in South Australia and operated from 1841 until 1988. Wikipedia

Cascades Female Factory.label: Cascades Female Factory
Cascades Female Factory.description: The Cascades Female Factory, a former Australian workhouse for female convicts in the penal colony of Van Diemen's Land, is located in Hobart, Tasmania. Wikipedia

HM Prison Geelong.label: HM Prison Geelong
HM Prison Geelong.description: HM Prison Geelong was a maximum security Australia prison located on the corner of Myers Street and Swanston Street in Geelong, Victoria, Australia. The prison was built in stages from 1849 to 1864. Wikipedia

Marshalsea.label: Marshalsea
Marshalsea.description: The Marshalsea was an infamous prison in England, located on the south bank of the River Thames in Southwark, now part of London. Wikipedia

Old Melbourne Gaol.label: Old Melbourne Gaol
Old Melbourne Gaol.description: The Old Melbourne Gaol is a museum and former prison located in Russell Street, Melbourne, Victoria, Australia. It consists of a bluestone building and courtyard, and is located next to the old City Police Watch House and City Courts buildings. Wikipedia

J Ward.label: J Ward
J Ward.description:
J Ward was an Australian prison used to house the criminally insane, located in Ararat, Victoria, Australia.
Construction of the goal commenced in 1859 and the facility was opened in October 1861. Wikipedia

Elayn Hunt Correctional Center.label: Elayn Hunt Correctional Center
Elayn Hunt Correctional Center.description: Elayn Hunt Correctional Center is located in St. Gabriel, Louisiana, is a multi-security- level Louisiana Department of Public Safety and Corrections institution for adult men. It is the second largest prison in Louisiana. Wikipedia

El Manzano (prison).label: El Manzano
El Manzano (prison).description: El Manzano is a prison in the city of Concepción, Chile. After the 2010 Chile earthquake a prison riot began following a failed escape attempt by the inmates. Wikipedia

Santa Rita Jail.label: Santa Rita Jail
Santa Rita Jail.description: Santa Rita Jail is a county jail located in Dublin, Alameda County, California adjacent to the Camp Parks Reserve Forces Training Area, and operated by the Alameda County Sheriff's Office. Wikipedia

Women's Huron Valley Correctional Facili.label: Women's Huron Valley Correctional Facility
Women's Huron Valley Correctional Facili.description: Women's Huron Valley Correctional Facility is a prison for women located in Pittsfield Township, operated by the Michigan Department of Corrections. The 3 letter designation for this facility is WHV. Wikipedia

Cherlapally Central Jail.label: Cherlapally Central Jail
Cherlapally Central Jail.description: Cherlapally Central Jail is a correctional facility in Cherlapally, Ranga Reddy district, AP, India. The facility is located 28 kilometres away from Hyderabad. Wikipedia

Musheerabad Jail.label: Musheerabad Jail
Musheerabad Jail.description: Musheerabad Jail was a correctional facility located in Musheerabad area of Hyderabad, India. The facility was demolished in 2003 and a hospital and a medical college were constructed in the same area. Wikipedia

State Correctional Institution – Dallas.label: State Correctional Institution – Dallas
State Correctional Institution – Dallas.description: The State Correctional Institution at Dallas, commonly referred to as SCI Dallas, is a Pennsylvania Department of Corrections prison located in Luzerne County, Pennsylvania, United States. Jerome Walsh is the institution's Superintendent. Wikipedia

Clinton Correctional Facility.label: Clinton Correctional Facility
Clinton Correctional Facility.description: Clinton Correctional Facility is a New York State Department of Correctional Services state prison for men located in the Village of Dannemora, New York. Wikipedia
Phone: New York State Department Of Correctional Services School District

State Correctional Institution – Camp Hi.label: State Correctional Institution – Camp Hill
State Correctional Institution – Camp Hi.description: The State Correctional Institution at Camp Hill, commonly referred to as SCI Camp Hill, is a Pennsylvania Department of Corrections prison in Lower Allen Township, Cumberland County, near Camp Hill in Greater Harrisburg. Wikipedia

Richmond Gaol.label: Richmond Gaol
Richmond Gaol.description: The Richmond Gaol is a convict era building and tourist attraction in Richmond, Tasmania, and is the oldest intact gaol in Australia. Building of the gaol commenced in 1825, and predates the establishment of the penal colony at Port Arthur in 1833. Wikipedia

Sullivan Correctional Facility.label: Sullivan Correctional Facility
Sullivan Correctional Facility.description: Sullivan Correctional Facility is a New York State correctional facility located in Fallsburg, New York. It is operated by the New York State Department of Correctional Services. It is a maximum security prison for male inmates. Wikipedia
District: New York State Department Of Correctional Services School District

Wetumpka State Penitentiary.label: Alabama State Penitentiary
Wetumpka State Penitentiary.description: The Wetumpka State Penitentiary, originally known as the Alabama State Penitentiary, was the first state prison established in Alabama. Wikipedia

Parklea Correctional Centre.label: Parklea Correctional Centre
Parklea Correctional Centre.description: Parklea Correctional Centre, a privately managed Australian maximum and minimum security prison for males, is located at Parklea, in the north-western suburbs of Sydney, New South Wales. Wikipedia

Sing Sing.label: Sing Sing
Sing Sing.description: Sing Sing Correctional Facility is a maximum security prison operated by the New York State Department of Corrections and Community Supervision in the town of Ossining, in the U.S. state of New York. Wikipedia

Great Meadow Correctional Facility.label: Great Meadow Correctional Facility
Great Meadow Correctional Facility.description: Great Meadow Correctional Facility is a maximum security prison in New York in the USA. The prison is in Comstock, a hamlet right outside of Fort Ann, in Washington County, New York. As of September 3, 2008 it was home to 1,663 inmates. Wikipedia
District: New York State Department Of Correctional Services School District

Adelaide Pre-Release Centre.label: Adelaide Pre-Release Centre
Adelaide Pre-Release Centre.description:
The Adelaide Pre-Release Centre is a minimum security Australian prison facility in Regency Park, South Australia, Australia.
Adelaide Pre-Release Centre Wikipedia
